creator: Ameelio
descriptionHtml:
Do you have a loved one incarcerated in the U.S.? Lift their spirits by sharing a piece of your life with them through our letters, photos, and postcards. All for free.

No more trips to the store for photo prints.
No more paying for postage.
No hidden fees.
No strings attached.

Why you’ll love it 💌
★ Locate your incarcerated loved one in seconds using our facility directory
★ Type a message & attach a photo
★ We'll print & mail it for you, for free
★ Track it all the way to the facility, all from your phone
★ Your notes and photos will become cherished keepsakes for your loved one

Is it really free? 🤔
Ameelio is a nonprofit. We believe that staying connected to your loved ones and paying for basic needs shouldn't be a tradeoff. Luckily, we’re not alone: our work is made possible by the generosity of like-minded charitable foundations, individual donors, and users who choose to “tip” us for our services.

We are committed to always providing free communications options to all families. We’ll soon be launching optional premium features at a price, but our core offerings will always remain free to all our users.

What the media is saying about Ameelio 📺

“These Yale students built an app that makes it super simple for people to communicate with incarcerated loved ones for free.” —Business Insider

“This app bypasses the absurdly high cost of making phone calls to prison by converting texts to snail mail.” —Fast Company

What users are saying about Ameelio ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

“This is the most amazing blessing I could have received.” —Shari

“It has been awesome. My LO was excited to get some extra lovin from his letter.” —Telle

“It is a blessing to loved ones to be able to communicate with our family especially during these times.” —Trish

Send any feedback to outreach@ameelio.org.

Privacy Policy: https://letters.ameelio.org/privacy_policy.pdf
Terms of Service: https://letters.ameelio.org/tos.pdf
descriptionShort: Send free letters, photos, and postcards daily to your incarcerated loved ones.

title: Ameelio: Free Letters & Photos to Prison

creator: Ameelio
descriptionHtml:
Do you have a loved one incarcerated in the U.S.? Lift their spirits by sharing a piece of your life with them through our letters, photos, postcards, games, and more. All for free.

No more trips to the store for photo prints.
No more paying for postage.
No hidden fees.
No strings attached.

Why you’ll love it 💌
★ Locate your incarcerated loved one in seconds using our facility directory
★ Write your personalized message & attach a photo
★ Save time and money – we print your message & mail it for you, for free
★ Track it all the way to the facility, all from your phone
★ Cherish your notes and photos as keepsakes for your loved one

Is it really free? 🤔
Yes! Ameelio is a nonprofit, and we believe you shouldn’t have to decide between staying connected to your loved ones and paying for basic needs. Luckily, we have a whole community backing us. Our work is made possible by the generosity of like-minded charitable foundations and individual donors.

We are committed to always providing free communications for all families. While we provide paid-for features for those who wish to choose from more options, all of the money from those purchases go directly toward supporting our core, free offerings. We remain committed to ensuring these offerings remain free for all.

What the media is saying about Ameelio 📺

“These Yale students built an app that makes it super simple for people to communicate with incarcerated loved ones for free.” —Business Insider

“Ameelio wants to take on for-profit, prison-calling rackets after starting with free letters to inmates.” —Techcrunch

“This app bypasses the absurdly high cost of making phone calls to prison by converting texts to snail mail.” —Fast Company

What users are saying about Ameelio ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

“This is the most amazing blessing I could have received.” —Shari

“It has been awesome. My LO was excited to get some extra lovin from his letter.” —Telle

“It is a blessing to loved ones to be able to communicate with our family especially during these times.” —Trish

“i love this organization u make our life so much easier to write to our families in prison!” — Ellie

Send any feedback to outreach@ameelio.org.

Privacy Policy: https://letters.ameelio.org/privacy_policy.pdf
Terms of Service: https://letters.ameelio.org/tos.pdf
descriptionShort: Send free letters, photos, and postcards daily to your incarcerated loved ones.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The Ameelio Gift Shop is finally here! Stop by to find something extra special to send to your loved one. As always, thank you for trusting us to deliver your messages.

title: Ameelio: Free Photo Cards & Letters to Prison

creator: Ameelio
descriptionHtml:
Do you have a loved one incarcerated in the U.S.? Lift their spirits by sharing a piece of your life with them through our letters, photos, postcards, games, and more. All for free.

No more trips to the store for photo prints.
No more paying for postage.
No hidden fees.
No strings attached.

Why you’ll love it 💌
★ Locate your incarcerated loved one in seconds using our facility directory
★ Write your personalized message & attach a photo
★ Save time and money – we print your message & mail it for you, for free
★ Track it all the way to the facility, all from your phone
★ Cherish your notes and photos as keepsakes for your loved one

Is it really free? 🤔
Yes! Ameelio is a nonprofit, and we believe you shouldn’t have to decide between staying connected to your loved ones and paying for basic needs. Luckily, we have a whole community backing us. Our work is made possible by the generosity of like-minded charitable foundations and individual donors.

We are committed to always providing free communications for all families. While we provide paid-for features for those who wish to choose from more options, all of the money from those purchases go directly toward supporting our core, free offerings. We remain committed to ensuring these offerings remain free for all.

What the media is saying about Ameelio 📺

“This app bypasses the absurdly high cost of making phone calls to prison by converting texts to snail mail.” —Fast Company

What users are saying about Ameelio ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

“This is the most amazing blessing I could have received.” —Shari

“It has been awesome. My LO was excited to get some extra lovin from his letter.” —Telle


Send any feedback to outreach@ameelio.org.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Thank you for your patience with the Letters app errors and poor performance! We’re a small nonprofit team of ten people serving over 250,000 users, so we’ve experienced quite a bit of growth. The past few months we’ve been working on making free video communication a reality in a couple of states, and on expanding our features to include voice calls and e-messaging— all part of our mission to disrupt the for-profit prison communications industry.

title: Ameelio: Free Photo Cards & Letters to Prison

creator: Ameelio
descriptionHtml:
Do you have a loved one incarcerated in the US? Lift their spirits by sharing a piece of your life with them through photos, letters, games, and more.

Why you’ll love it
• Sending photos and letters is free for anyone who needs it
• Save time and money – we'll print & mail it for you
• Our printing is high quality and something your loved one will cherish


What is Ameelio?
Ameelio is a nonprofit, and we believe that staying connected with your loved one shouldn’t be a financial burden. We want to make it easy for people to stay connected through a challenging time in their life.

We are committed to providing affordable communications for all families—anyone who needs it can always send free mail. Those who wish to support free mail for others can contribute by purchasing special gifts for their loved one. All of the money from these purchases goes directly toward supporting our free offerings.


What users are saying about Ameelio
“This is the most amazing blessing I could have received.” —Shari
“It has been awesome. My LO was excited to get some extra lovin from his letter.” —Telle
“It is a blessing to loved ones to be able to communicate with our family especially during these times.” —Trish


Send any feedback to support@ameelio.org.
descriptionShort: Send photos, letters, games, and more to your incarcerated loved ones.

Ameelio is a nonprofit, and we believe that staying connected with your loved one shouldn’t be a financial burden. We want to make it easy for people to stay connected through a challenging time in their life.

We are committed to providing affordable communications for all families—anyone who needs it can always send free mail. Those who wish to support free mail for others can contribute by purchasing special gifts for their loved one. All of the money from these purchases goes directly toward supporting our free offerings.


What users are saying about Ameelio

“It has been awesome. My LO was excited to get some extra lovin from his letter.” —Telle
“It is a blessing to loved ones to be able to communicate with our family especially during these times.” —Trish

title: Ameelio Mail: Photos to Prison

creator: Ameelio
descriptionHtml:
Do you have a loved one incarcerated in the US? Lift their spirits by sharing a piece of your life with them through photos and letters.

Why you’ll love it
• Sending photos and letters is free for anyone who needs it—just let us know in the app
• Save time and money—we'll print and mail it for you
• Our printing is high quality and something your loved one will cherish


What is Ameelio?
Ameelio is a nonprofit, and we believe that staying connected with your loved one shouldn’t be a financial burden. We want to make it easy for people to stay connected through a challenging time in their life.

We are committed to providing affordable communications for all families—anyone who needs it can always send free mail. Those who wish to support free mail for others can contribute by purchasing special gifts for their loved one. All of the money from these purchases goes directly toward supporting our free offerings.


What users are saying about Ameelio

“It has been awesome. My LO was excited to get some extra lovin from his letter.” —Telle
“It is a blessing to loved ones to be able to communicate with our family especially during these times.” —Trish
